pages.text: The $(mob)Wither$() is a boss that can be summoned by players. It floats around, fring explosive skulls that apply $(thing)Wither$() on impact to all nearby living creatures, including players.$(p)When it falls below half heart, it loses its ability to float but becomes immune to projectiles.
$(mob)Withers$() drop a $(item)Nether Star$() on death. It can be used to craft a $(item)Beacon$().
Summoning a $(mob)Wither$(), place 3 $(l:minecraft_wither_skeleton)$(item)Wither Skeleton Skulls$() above it once built.
